works.title: Undergraduate Teaching Assistant
description: Supervise 4 teams of students as they spend the semester developing an Android application
Hold weekly office hours and grade homework, demos, and exams

works.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Developed new core features on PagerDuty’s web platform
Implemented logic to produce webhook payload to Kafka cluster for a new service to consume
Discovered and fixed a major issue in API testing set up
Refactored an existing Javascript codebase to make it easier for debugging and unit testing
Participated in HackDay and won an award for the Best Product Enhancement
Technologies include Ruby on Rails, EmberJS, Coffeescript, MySQL, AWS Lambda

works.title: Software Engineer Intern
description: Gathered real-time metrics and implemented real-time health of internal software systems to improve visibility and to allow support team to quickly identify issues
Built a notification service that supports creating, signaling, and subscribing to internal applications’ health score
Migrated an e-commerce dashboard from PHP MVC framework to Angular2

education.degree: Bachelor of Science in Computer Science
